thread.title: Mrs Paul, Leicester
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs Paul, Leicester

author: Mrs Paul, Leicester
title: Mrs Paul, Leicester
text: This is the second time I have ordered blinds with Blinds 2 go and they service is wonderful and the products are of excellent quality. When I needed replacement fittings for my first blinds, the company sent them complimentary and also very quick. I would recommend the company.
